NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Accounting and Assets or the cell corresponding to Financial Tech and Risk?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Financial Tech} and {Risk} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Banking and Expenses or the cell corresponding to Accounting and Profit?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Insurance and Liabilities or the cell corresponding to Financial Tech and Liquidity?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Insurance} and {Liabilities} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.45 to 0.46?
